analysis.description:
ShareXTokenVault.allocate (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#365-380) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) == totalAllocation)

ShareXTokenVault.allocate (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#365-380) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) == totalAllocation)
ShareXTokenVault.notLocked (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#348-352) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(lockedAt == 0)
	- require(bool)(lockedAt == 0)

Reentrancy in ShareXTokenVault.allocate (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#365-380):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) == totalAllocation) (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#371-372)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocations (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#372-376)
	- allocations (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#376-377)
	- lockedAt (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#380)
	- timeLocks (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#380)

ShareXTokenVault.claimTokenReserve (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#422-449) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > timeLocks[reserveWallet]) (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#424-425)

ShareXTokenVault.teamVestingStage (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol#474-488) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- stage > teamVestingStages (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol)

ShareXTokenVault.canCollect (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > timeLocks[msg.sender] && claimed[msg.sender] == 0 (/unique_chucks/31/0x21a0f01b9b3b7f8dafc62dceaca5c6c31d42d633.sol)
